EmailTemplate.name: SPA Communication to Managers for Composite Profile
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Performance Assessment Manager Composite Profile
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In preparation of rolling out the Sales Performance Assessment (SPA) for the {ENTER NAME OF TEAM}, management needs to identify at least 5 top Sales Professionals to create composite sales success profiles. Please identify sales professionals and email me names by {!Case.MGR_Pre_Call_Date__c}.
Please review the attached documents:
Sales Performance Assessment Overview: Overview to help understand what the assessment tool is and the 18 behaviors and 6 drivers assessed. Sales Intelligence: Defines the Composite Profile.
Click the link if you are interested in learning more about the company Management Research Group we collaborate with to administer the Sales Performance Assessment.
I really encourage you to take time to become familiar with the company and the available tools for employee development. As a WEX Leader, you will be a mentor and talent multiplier for your team.
Thank you and give me a call if you like to chat more about this.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
WEX University Global Training
